**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 280 2.0 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- This white wood staff is capped at each end with a golden cross adorned with ruby cabochons. A staff of healing grants an item bonus to the Hit Points you restore anytime you cast the heal spell using your own spell slots or charges from the staff. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Effect** You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed ranks of all listed spells. Staff of Healing **Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 280 2.0, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 595 4.0 **Price** 90 gp --- The item bonus granted to heal spells is +1.
  • **Cantrip** [_stabilize_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1689)
  • **1st** [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1554)
Staff of Healing (Greater) **Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 280 2.0, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 595 4.0 **Price** 470 gp --- The item bonus granted to heal spells is +2.
  • **2nd** [_clear mind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1469), heal, [_sound body_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1679)
  • **3rd** [_cleanse affliction_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1467), heal
Staff of Healing (Major) **Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 280 2.0, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 595 4.0 **Price** 1,800 gp --- The item bonus granted to heal spells is +3.
  • **4th** cleanse affliction, clear mind, sound body
  • **5th** [_breath of life_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1456), heal
Staff of Healing (True) **Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 280 2.0, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 595 4.0 **Price** 9,200 gp --- The item bonus granted to heal spells is +4.
  • **6th** clear mind, [_field of life_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1526), heal
  • **7th** heal, [_regenerate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1648)
name: Staff of Healing (True)
